subject: AI & Agents
title: Sora: Text to Video
description: A micro-lesson that makes Sora: Text to Video usable.

hook.text: A woman walks through neon-lit Tokyo streets. Every detail is photorealistic. Every frame is AI-generated.

buildup.text: OpenAI's Sora generates up to 60 seconds of high-definition video from text prompts.

discovery.text: It models videos as sequences of spacetime patches, extending diffusion from 2D images to 3D video.

twist.text: Physical inconsistencies remain â€” a glass shatters but reassembles, gravity shifts mid-scene.

climax.text: The film and advertising industries face a fundamental question: what becomes of video production?

punchline.text: From text to moving pictures. Cinema's next revolution.

quiz.question: What does OpenAI's Sora generate?
options: Only still images from video input
